quote: None of us can change our yesterdays but all of us can change our tomorrows. – Colin Powell
fact: Mosquito repellents don`t repel. They hide you. The spray blocks the mosquito`s sensors so they don`t know you`re there.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
